name: StockTwits Dark Theme (outdated)
description: TradeTheTrend-sponsored dark theme to improve the look of StockTwits. This is a minimal design: many share features have been removed from posts/page items. PLEASE NOTE This is still under development, it was only released yesterday. Updates will be released daily for next few days as I find issues.
